page.text: With a powerful blast of lightning the lizard lass sends you tumbling backwards and sprawling on the ground. The room spins for a few moments and you have trouble concentrating on your surroundings. A warm feeling around your feet and a wet squelching sound bring memory of the odd lizard girl flooding back into your mind. A tug on your toes leads you to believe that if you don’t escape, though, you may be heading for a one way tour of her digestive system.

choice.text: try and coax her into letting you go

The intestinal walls grip your body and pull you backwards, through a winding maze of gut. Villi tickle your feet as they are pulled into the small intestine, and soon you find your entire body being rubbed down but the intestinal walls. As you are stuffed into the odd end of the lizard lass’s digestive tract you take a moment to consider your life up to now. You crash landed on a hostile world, repair a shuttle craft using broken robots, and now you’re in an anthropomorphic lizard’s ass. Well you’ve certainly done something. The raijin seems to be thoroughly enjoying your movements, though it seems she doesn’t think that you’re moving quite enough. She bends her tail and pushes it in to join you. As she uses it like a dildo the tip pushes against the top of your head repeatedly. gameover.text: It’s not long before the digestive acids begins pouring in. The raijin purrs in delight as you writhe in the digestive slop, enzymes slowly breaking your body down and providing energy for the lizard lady to capture more meals with. As you press frantically against the stomach walls, searching for an escape route, you feel the raijin press back, pushing the caustic walls against your skin. The lizard shudders for a few moments as she orgasms and finally collapses on top of you, eliminating any possibility of escape. She naps as you’re reduced to mush and absorbed by her intestines, filling out her curves and padding her tush.
